document_data.name: Shadowstone
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the weapon|the novel|The Shadow Stone}}
The '''Shadowstone''' was a powerful [[Shadow Weave]] [[heavy mace]] created by the goddess [[Shar]].
document_data.Description: The [[mace]] weighed 8 lb (3.6 kg), and radiated a strong [[necromancy]] and [[abjuration]] aura. The wielder of this magical item was protected as if they possessed a ''[[scarab of protection]]'' and they cast more powerful darkness spells. Individuals hit by this dark weapon could be struck blind.
document_data.History: The Shadowstone was created by the goddess Shar, Mistress of the Night. She gave it to [[Damian Krale]] to aid him in uniting and leading the Sharran cells of the [[Western Heartlands]].
